title: Rutger Bregman’s optimistic history of the world
itunes:title: Rutger Bregman’s optimistic history of the world
itunes:subtitle: Rutger Bregman ranges through the past to argue that humanity is inherently good. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Bestselling Dutch historian Rutger Bregman discusses his new book, Humankind: A Hopeful History, which ranges through the past to argue that humanity is inherently good. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
